snippet: Clotilde Hryshko, a friend from whom I buy vegetables whenever I can, regales us with her recipe for "micro-fusion sandwiches."
abstract: Clotilde Hryshko, a friend from whom I buy vegetables whenever I can, regales us with her recipe for "micro-fusion sandwiches."
lead_paragraph: Clotilde, a friend from whom I buy vegetables whenever I can, farms at Camp Merrishko, in East Brookfield, Vt., where she lives with her husband and daughters. She says, "I've been farming for 20 years, and I'm at the personal point where food preservation and family meals are a daily goal."
